title: Bandelier National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons         Visitor center hours are 9 AM to 430 PM during winter. Photo by Sally King  Bandelier National Monument and Visitor Center Operating Hours Bandelier National Monument is open daily, year round, from dawn to dusk except during heavy snow days or other emergencies. Juniper Campground is open year round, but may be closed to only "A" loop.   Visitor Center Hours from May 14 - October 18, 2016 are 9 AM to 6 PM Visitor Center/WNPA Book Store are closed December 25 and January 1.  Â   Park Hours Frijoles Canyon, Tsankawi , and all park trails are open to recreation from dawn to dusk.  Backpacking permits must be obtained at the Frijoles Canyon Visitor Center for any overnight stays in the park's backcountry.
